examples.example: 老师非常耐心地纠正我们的读音。

translate.english: The teacher corrected our pronunciation very patiently.

examples.example: 我们在课堂上认真学习每个汉字的读音。

translate.english: We study the pronunciation of each Chinese character carefully in class.

examples.example: 我每天都会练习标准的读音，让自己的普通话更加流利。

translate.english: I practice standard pronunciation every day to make my Mandarin more fluent.
